Sequence Information.Target Organism: Tumor cells:IMR-5 (23% apoptosis at 10 µM); NB69 (25% apoptosis at 10 µM); IMR-5 (35% apoptosis at 20 µM); NGP (43% apoptosis at 10 µM); SK-N-AS (45% apoptosis at 20 µM); NGP (46% apoptosis at 20 µM); IMR-5 (55% apoptosis at 50 µM); SK-N-AS (65% apoptosis at 50 µM); NB69 (66% apoptosis at 20 µM); NB69 (68% apoptosis at 50 µM); NGP (79% apoptosis at 50 µM); SK-N-AS (8% apoptosis at 10 µM)
Sequence Information.Comments: Induce apoptosis in highly malignant NB-derived cell lines

Literature.Title: BH3 peptidomimetics potently activate apoptosis and demonstrate single agent efficacy in neuroblastoma
Literature.Author: Yao Z, Qiu S, Wang L, Lu R, Zhou CL, Zhao PP, Li HQ, Gao WY.
